price: Wͻbεdwodwo wͻn ho wͻ hͻ, na wͻbεfrε ama yεde nnuaba ahodoͻ pii ne anomdeε (abrε wͻn) wͻ hͻ.
arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا يَدۡعُونَ فِيهَا بِفَٰكِهَةٖ كَثِيرَةٖ وَشَرَابٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: muttakiīna fīhā yadʿūna fīhā bifākihatin kathīratin washarābin
